Text: From here on out if you want iso images just look for Deftone30! I'll take requests on first "ask" from served basis. lol. Tomorrow will come Get Rich or Die Tryin' which is also due next week. Cheers!

Im new at this...can someone tell me how to burn an ISO file with NERO 7 plz...
Thx in advance
jacyclassy......very easy. Just go to Buring Rom in Nero. Click on Recorder in the top menu and then click on Burn Image. It will ask u to find the file u want to burn and that's about it!

By the way: Nero-Images (.NRG) can also be burnt under Linux. Just use K3b, it will recognize them...
